title: 【临时工搬运】自定义的生物群落-Custom Biomes Redone
author: 筒子
txt_content:
自定义的生物群落
Custom Biomes Redone



Hello all!  I have returned from my 6 month hiatus from PMC. 
I present to you all, The Custom Biome Redone Project. 
This is actually a collection of 4 different maps, all of which are custom biomes you've all seen - but with a twist that's never been seen before!  Each biome has several unique fantasy inspired features in it.  For example, 
[book]简单翻译[book]然而我看不懂作者在说什么东西...下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]与上一个地形是一个作者，做的都非常的好看，整体也很协调希望大家可以喜欢我这次的搬运[painting]图片欣赏[painting]



[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*
更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
